keyMappings:
map <a-h> LinkHints.activateMode action=hover
map <a-F> LinkHints.activateMode action=focus
map <a-i> passNextKey
map <a-M> toggleMuteTab all
map <a-w> createTab https://web.whatsapp.com/
map <a-u> createTab https://aulavirtual.unsa.edu.pe/2024B/login/index.php
map R reload hard
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
gh: https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=repositories Github
ym: https://music.youtube.com/search?q=%s YT Music
wa: https://web.whatsapp.com/send/?phone=+51%s&text=&type=phone_number&app_absent=0 Whatsapp Chat
wm: https://web.whatsapp.com/send/?text=%s&type=custom_url&app_absent=0 Whatsapp Message
fb: https://web.facebook.com/search/top/?q=%s Facebook
gg: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
yt: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google Maps
